data.meta_description: Learn about Amanda Seyfried on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that include Amanda Seyfried including Mean Girls, Mamma Mia! and more.
data.text:
Outcry

When a missing 16-year-old girl shows up in a abandoned building, she tells detectives that she was held there against her will by three men in uniform.

Detox

House agrees to stop taking painkillers for a week in exchange for a month without clinic duty, but the team thinks detox is affecting his judgement in the case of a young man's unexplained blood loss.

Pilot

Following her father's removal from the office of town sheriff, high-school student Veronica Mars finds herself ostracised by her peers. She comes to the aid of Wallace, a new arrival to the school who is fast becoming a victim of bullying.

Rashomama

The team investigate the death of a lawyer who was killed at her son's wedding, but the case is compromised when all the evidence is stolen.
